titleStmt.title: To his excellencie the Lord Generall Cromwell, and his Honourable Councell of the army at White-Hall. The petition of Arise Evans, living in Black friers, desireth in Gods glories behalf, the kingdoms behalf, your Honors behalf, and the whole worlds behalf : that you would with your most serious thoughts consider these few lines following.
titleStmt.author: Evans, Arise, b. 1607.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
